text: Song O' My Heart is a 1930 American romance movie directed by Frank Borzage and starring John McCormack, Alice Joyce, Maureen O'Sullivan, John Garrick, Effie Ellsler. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1930 movies Category:1930s romance movies Category:American romance movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Frank Borzage
title: Song O' My Heart
